oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Implementation of New EU Livestock Regulations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sneyd, Sarah
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Regulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In August 2000 UKROFS produced updated livestock standards of production to comply with EU regulation 1804/1999. The main changes are summarized. The various organic certifying bodies have adapted their standards in response to these changes. In some cases they go significantly further than the new standards require.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Sneyd, Sarah (2000) Implementation of New EU Livestock Regulations. Elm Farm Research Centre Bulletin (51), p. 15.
